example.name: Everest! (Regular usage)
example.text: Fortunately, he was met by a NPS patrol who *T* sledded him down to Windy Corner where his condition improved enough for him to begin his own descent.
example.arg: down to Windy Corner where his condition improved enough for him to begin his own descent
